page.title: 05EVERYDAY LIFE (1)
page.content: We conducted a survey by delivering a questionnaire to every house in Halberton. We received 42 replies. { PROVISIONS} Most people do their general shopping in Tiverton.{9}people get their shopping delivered,{33}do not. Most people do their shopping once weekly. A lot of people go to {Tiverton}to do their shopping at least once a week. A lot of people go to{Exeter}or{ {Tiverton}to buy presents.Most people would go to {Exeter}to buy clothes.If the people wanted to buy large goods they would go to {Exeter.} {Leisure} Most people do not go to a sports centre,but a few do.A couple of people belong to a sports club,but not many.They go to sports clubs such as { {Tiverton Youth Centre.}One person belongs to a pool team,and{2}belong to
